title: Chapter 1993 - Chapter 1993: I’Ll Kill You
body:
Chapter 1993 - Chapter 1993: I’Ll Kill You

Chapter 1993: I’ll kill you

Translator: 549690339

“Feng wuchen, come out and face your death!”

Lu Ming shouted again, his voice shaking the entire base.

“Lu Ming, how dare you break the door of the Wind Clan for no reason. Today, you must give us an explanation no matter what!”

One of the wind race’s quasi-emperors shouted coldly.

“Explanation? bullshit! Get lost!”

Lu Ming swept his gaze across the room and told the other party to get lost, not giving him any face at all.

The people from the other forces all had different expressions and were secretly shocked.

The Wind Clan was an ancient clan with a long history. They had a deep foundation and were extremely powerful. However, Lu Ming did not give them any face at all. He even told the Wind Clan to get lost.

you’re too arrogant! I’ll cripple you!

An Emperor-to-be roared and his body turned into a gust of wind, rushing toward Lu Ming. With a wave of his hand, a dense wind blade flew out, extremely sharp, and attacked Lu Ming.

BOOM!

Lu Ming did not even look at him. He threw a punch, causing the air to tremble. The wind blades flew backward under the force of Lu Ming’s violent punch and hit the opponent’s body.

The wind race’s Emperor-to-be let out a blood-curdling screech as his body was sent flying back. He crashed into the wall of the wind race’s Palace and lay on the ground, half-dead.

Everyone was shocked. Lu Ming’s combat strength was terrifying. He had injured an Emperor-to-be with one punch without even looking at him.

where’s Feng wuchen? has he become a tortoise? tell him to come out!

Lu Ming took a step forward. The experts of the wind tribe could not help but take a few steps back.

“Lu Ming, how dare you come to my Wind Clan, smash our gate, and even injure our people. What do you want?”

A cold voice was heard. Feng wuchen walked out of the Feng clan’s Palace and looked at Lu Ming with an ugly expression.

He did not expect Lu Ming to be so bold as to directly attack the Wind Clan’s encampment.

“I’m here to kill you!”

Lu Ming continued to step forward. He was very direct and could not be bothered to talk nonsense with Feng wuchen.

Back then, in the world of the lotus flower, the reason why Qiu Yue was injured was also related to Feng wuchen.

At that time, Feng wuchen and the experts of the Feng clan had joined forces with the people of the Daluo heaven sect to hurt Qiu Yue.

And now, Feng wuchen was even more aggressive. Not only did he purposely make things difficult for them, he even lured the three-eyed God race’s experts to kill them with a borrowed knife.

Lu Ming’s killing intent towards Feng wuchen had already reached the extreme. He could not bear it anymore.

He had to kill Feng wuchen today.

Feng wuchen’s expression changed. He couldn’t help but take a few steps back behind the experts of the Wind Clan and shouted,” “Lu Ming, I didn’t expect you to be so narrow-minded. When you wanted to exchange for resources and treasures, I said that 1 didn’t have enough treasures and asked you to come back after a period of time. You’ve harbored a grudge against me and wanted to kill me!”

now is the time for us to unite against the enemy, but you want to kill me and cause internal strife. 1 really wonder if you have already joined the alien race!

Feng wuchen directly put all the blame on Lu Ming, saying that Lu Ming was narrow-minded and even said that Lu Ming had joined the alien race.

Huang Ling, Lu Xiangxiang, and the others were so angry that their faces turned green.

He had seen shameless people, but he had never seen someone so shameless.

you’re talking nonsense. You’re the one who hates my master and US. On the battlefield, you deliberately led the alien races to kill us and wanted to kill us with a borrowed knife. Now you’re slandering us!

Lu Xiangxiang cried out unhappily.

Many people’s gazes moved as they thought to themselves, so that’s how it is.

To be able to cultivate to this stage, they were all smart people. Previously, when Feng wuchen randomly accused them, not many people would believe it.

On the contrary, more people believed Lu Xiangxiang’s words.

It was no wonder that Lu Ming was so murderous that he went straight to the Wind Clan’s encampment. It turned out that Feng wuchen wanted to kill with a borrowed knife and deliberately led the alien race to Lu Ming and the others.

He was really despicable!

Many people were thinking this, but no one stood out. The wind race was an ancient race and was very powerful. Who would dare to offend the wind race?

There were also some people who were gloating, such as the Golden Crow race and the WAN family.

They would be happier if the conflict between Lu Ming and the wind Clan intensified and they killed each other.

They hoped that the Wind Clan would kill Lu Ming!

“Little girl, you’re talking nonsense. You’re full of nonsense. It was your master who told you to slander me, right? you need evidence to speak.”

Feng wuchen sneered.

it’s clearly like that. We can all testify!

Lu Xiangxiang said.

“You’ll testify? What a joke, it’s more like you guys are ganging up to slander me!”

Feng wuchen sneered.

“You…”

Lu Xiangxiang’s face was red with anger.

Bang!

At this moment, Lu Ming suddenly took another step forward and said,” “Xiangxiang, why are you talking so much nonsense with this kind of person? just kill him directly!”

Buzzzzzz!

Then, Lu Ming’s figure suddenly accelerated and he rushed toward Feng wuchen.

“How audacious!”

“Let’s join forces and take him down!”

The many emperors-to-be of the wind race were furious. In an instant, at least ten of them attacked Lu Ming.

“Get lost!”

die! Lu Ming shouted. The light of chaos enveloped his body and he used the chaotic finger of tribulation, pointing ten times in succession.

Bang! Bang!

With a series of collision sounds, the ten Emperor-to-be’s attacks were broken. Their bodies trembled and they retreated.

There was a bloody hole in each of their bodies, and blood was flowing out.

Hiss hiss hiss…

Many people gasped.

The combined forces of ten Emperor-to-be experts were no match for Lu Ming and were instantly injured by him. Such combat strength was too terrifying.

“Feng wuchen, you will die today!”

Lu Ming took another step forward, causing Feng wuchen’s face to turn pale. He could not help but retreat.

“Enough!”

At this moment, a cold voice was heard. A figure walked out of the wind Clan’s Palace, and a vast aura filled the air.

Emperor might!

This was a martial sovereign!

Feng wuchen was overjoyed. Lu Ming could not do anything to him when a Martial Emperor attacked.

“Elder, Lu Ming is a lawless man. Not only did he destroy the Wind Clan’s main gate, but he also continuously injured our experts. Hurry up and kill this man!”

Feng wuchen shouted.

Lu Ming looked at the Wind Clan’s Martial Emperor and said calmly,” you’re a martial Supreme. Try and attack me!

The Wind Clan’s Martial Emperor frowned when he heard this.

The hearts of the people from the other powers also moved. They thought back to a few years ago, to uncle Kong.

Lu Ming had an extremely powerful figure behind him.

Given Lu Ming’s current realm, if the other party attacked an Emperor-to-be, uncle Kong would probably not say anything. However, if the other party attacked a Martial Emperor, would uncle Kong make a trip to the wind tribe?

“Lu Ming, don’t push your luck. It’s easy to break if you’re too hard. Leave. I’ll let today’s matter rest!”

The wind race’s martial sovereign said.

Many people’s eyes flickered. The wind race’s martial sovereign’s words were equivalent to giving in.

This made Feng wuchen’s eyes flash with unwillingness. Today, he had a good reason to kill Lu Ming.

However, Lu Ming clearly did not appreciate it.

you can let it go, but I didn’t say that. Feng wuchen deliberately led the alien race to kill us. He must die!

Lu Ming’s voice was cold. The murderous intent on his body grew stronger, causing the temperature at the scene to drop.

“Lu Ming, you’re going too far. Don’t think that you can do whatever you want just because you have the backing of an old man. The wind race is fearless!”

The wind race’s martial sovereign’s face turned grave as he said coldly..
